fetch Class

Defined in: index.js:138
Module: fetch

Controls fetching information from the open lsu booklet portal

  • Index
  • Methods

Item Index

Methods

  • fetchData
  • fetchDepartments

Methods

fetchData

(
  • secondsBefore
  • shortHours
  • longHours
)

Defined in index.js:146

Waits a few seconds before polling for new data, then gets necessary information from LSU. (eg. Departments are long hours data, course info is short hour data.)

Parameters:

  • secondsBefore Int

    number of seconds before trying to start requesting data

  • shortHours Int

    number of hours to wait between requests

  • longHours Int

    number of hours to wait between requests

Returns:

void

fetchDepartments

()

Defined in index.js:166

Send a request to the public LSU course booklet that returns the names of all of the departments at LSU and saves them to the database

Returns:

void
